props.items: Array of transformed VuetifyListItem objects to display in the list. These are typically processed items from the parent command palette component.
props.selectedIndex: Zero-based index of the currently selected item for keyboard navigation. Defaults to -1 (no selection).

slots.item: Customizes individual item rendering. Scoped slot receives: `item` (VCommandPaletteItem data), `props` (computed accessibility and styling props).
slots.no-data: Content displayed when no items are available. No slot props provided.
slots.prepend-list: Content prepended to the list, before the first item. No slot props provided.
slots.append-list: Content appended to the list, after the last item. No slot props provided.

events.click:item: Emitted when an item is clicked. Payload: item (VuetifyListItem object), event (MouseEvent or KeyboardEvent).
events.hover: Emitted when an item is hovered. Payload: selectableIndex (number) - the index of the hovered selectable item.
